page.title: 12LIVING IN A VILLAGE
page.content: IN DURRINGTON THERE ISN'T MUCH IN THE WAY OF ENTERTAINMENT, SO MANY PEOPLE LEAVE TO GO TO THE CINEMA, BEACH, SPORTS, CINEMA,BEACH,MARKET,LEISURE CENTRE,DISCO, OR FAIR, OR EVEN THE CIRCUS,SHOPPING,MONUMENTS,RESTAURANTS AND MANY OTHER THINGS.AT THE MOMENT DURRINGTON HAS A SWIMMING POOL WITH GYM AND SAUNA EQUIPMENT, A VILLAGE CHURCH, CONSERVATIVE HALL,(IN THESE JUMBLE SALES, DISCOS AND YOUTH CLUBS ARE HELD.)TWO PUBS,ONE CLUB,TWO PAPER SHOPS,THREE FOOD SHOPS, ONE GROCERY SHOP, ONE CAKE SHOP,ONE POST OFFICE, TWO BANKS,FOUR HAIRDRESSERS, LIBRARY, ONE CHIP SHOP, ONE CHINESE TAKE AWAY, TWO DIY SHOPS,ONE BUTCHER,ONE FLOWER SHOP,ONE CAMERA SHOP,A GARAGE,THREE CHURCHES,THREE SCHOOLS, A RECREATION GROUND,AND A FEW FACTORIES.MANY PEOPLE LEAVE THE VILLAGE AT LEAST ONCE A WEEK BY BUS OR BY CAR.
